name: Charlie Gracie
body:
### Bio
Charlie Gracie is currently working at IBM as the Garbage Collection Architect on the J9 Java Virtual Machine and a on the Eclipse OMR project. He has more than a decade of JVM development experience where he has mainly been focused on scalability. Check out the [Eclipse OMR](https://github.com/eclipse/omr) project. Recently he has also been looking into CRuby performance and getting back to his Smalltalk roots with [SOM++](https://github.com/SOM-st/SOMpp).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
